{"id":1362121283,"question_id":42,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1724135576,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1362121283/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"25.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int n=height.size();\n        vector<int>pref(n,0);\n        vector<int>suff(n,0);\n        pref[0]=height[0];\n        for(int i=1;i<n;i++){\n            pref[i]=max(pref[i-1],height[i]);\n        }\n        suff[n-1]=height[n-1];\n        for(int i=n-2;i>=0;i--){\n            suff[i]=max(suff[i+1],height[i]);\n        }\n        int levelorz=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            levelorz+=min(pref[i],suff[i])-height[i];\n        }\n        return levelorz;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
